name: moor
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wo(w0, w1))

comment: "At most one" is still the case when a disjunct is removed. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.)
